title: David Einhorn Sees ‘Tremendous’ Capital Losses From AI Spending
description: Hedge fund manager David Einhorn cautioned that the unprecedented amount of spending on artificial intelligence infrastructure may destroy vast amounts of capital, even if the technology itself proves transformative.

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - Landmark $1.5 Billion Settlement Paves New Path for AI Accountability
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.

title: Countries Consider A.I.’s Dangers and Benefits at U.N.
description: The United Nations announced a new “global dialogue on artificial intelligence governance,” and a new global A.I. panel on the technology’s risks and rewards.
content:
The United Nations on Thursday announced a plan to establish itself as the leading global forum to guide the path and pace of artificial intelligence, a major foray into the raging debate over the future of the rapidly changing technology.

title: Microsoft reduces Israel's access to AI products over Gaza mass surveillance
description: Microsoft said it has disabled services to a unit within the Israeli military after a company review had determined its artificial intelligence and cloud computing products were being used to help carry out mass surveillance of Palestinians.

description: The film Together has reportedly been altered using artificial intelligence by a Chinese film distributor.
content:
